The ceramic cup was rather nicely packaged with a white box, however, the S'well bottle only had a flimsy transparent plastic bag to hold, which made it look rather cheap. There's a little #GoldLife in every cup. Green and Welcome members, from now until 26 Jun, enjoy 1 drink reward with every 60 Stars earned.

Gold members, on top of your usual drink reward with every 60 Stars earned, you'll receive an extra drink customization reward. #SipRedeemRepeat

comments.message: I am gold member. But didn't receive extra free customization with 60 stars collected. Appears like the Starbucks card system got bugs. There were few times with charging error (over charged me) at other outlets. Besides, there was a time I topped up $20 to my card but didn't capture at all!!!! What's going on Starbucks??? I used to be a loyal customer that visit at least 5 days a week and 1-4 times a day! Now I'm so disappointed that I reduced my visit.

Resend: T1 public area SB used to have a group of very skillful staff and barista. However, recent months having new staff and barista, the standard of hot food preparation and handcrafted beverages drops a lot, even the fresh brew coffee also very diluted (really cannot make it, since then I never buy the breakfast sets) compared to other outlets. Nonetheless, there are 2 or 3 old barista/staff are still there should be complimented for their skills and good attitude. Besides, melted, collapsed, chipped off or broken cakes shouldn't be sold to customers. How will you feel if they serve you a piece of cake with a corner dropped off?

SGH SB beverages standard is consistent and the best so far. Thank you all!
